Description: * Respawn time at 20min reduced from 50s to 45s (was 40s previous patch)
* Zipline Boost cooldown reduced from 340s (5.6min) to 280s (4.6min)
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb damage spirit scaling reduced from 0.7 to 0.6
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb T3 damage reduced from +60 to +50
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb vertical radius is now a fixed 2m pancake shape instead of the full radius of the ability
* {{PageRef|Ivy}} Ivy: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} Air Drop explosion now respects line of sight
* {{PageRef|Mirage}} Mirage: Bullet radius reduced from 8 to 6
* {{PageRef|Mirage}} Mirage: {{PageRef|Tornado}} Tornado time for victims to reach max height reduced from 0.3s to 0.2s
* {{PageRef|Mirage}} Mirage: {{PageRef|Tornado}} Tornado lift duration reduced from 1.2s to 1.1s
* {{PageRef|Mirage}} Mirage: Fixed {{PageRef|Tornado}} Tornado being castable while busy (such as while channeling {{PageRef|Traveler}} Traveler)
* {{PageRef|Mirage}} Mirage: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} Djinn's Mark T1 now only applies the slow when the multiplier is 2x or higher
* {{PageRef|Mirage}} Mirage: {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} Djinn's Mark damage is now treated as a DoT in terms of zipline rules (doesn't prevent ziplining or knock you off)
* {{PageRef|Mirage}} Mirage: Fixed {{PageRef|Djinn's Mark}} Djinn's Mark applying bullet procs with {{PageRef|Return Fire}} Return Fire
* {{PageRef|Pocket}} Pocket: Fixed {{PageRef|Mystic Reverb}} Mystic Reverb causing {{PageRef|Affliction}} Affliction damage be lethal
* Fixed certain player name lengths not being reportable
